sentences.sentence: She felt herself transcending time and space.
sentences.translation: 她感觉自己正在超越时空。

sentences.sentence: Definition of Craziness: Crazy stands for the human spirit of transcending oneself.
sentences.translation: 疯狂的定义：“疯狂”代表着人超越自我的精神。

sentences.sentence: At least the old memories of the east Village spirit will always stay, transcending the passage of time.
sentences.translation: 至少对于东村精神的久远回忆将永远驻留下去，超越时光的流逝。
